title: Weekly goals
content: Finish project report, update client on progress, and prepare slides for Friday's review meeting.

title: Code cleanup
content: Refactor the utils folder, remove unused dependencies, and improve function naming consistency.

title: UI improvements
content: Fix button alignment on mobile view and tweak color contrast for better accessibility.

title: Backend performance
content: Investigate slow response times in the /notes API. Possible indexing issue in MongoDB.

title: Team update
content: Send short progress summary in Slack before 5 PM. Keep it concise — no more than 3 bullet points.

title: Client feedback
content: Review comments from the client about the dashboard redesign and plan next adjustments.

title: New feature draft
content: Sketch an outline for the 'Save for later' option in the note editor.

title: Bug list
content: 1. Pagination jumps on reload. 2. Tag filter not persisting. 3. Modal closes unexpectedly.

title: Deployment prep
content: Run full test suite before merge. Verify `.env` variables in production config.

title: API review
content: Compare REST endpoints with GraphQL approach for the next version.

title: Documentation task
content: Update README with new environment setup steps and screenshot examples.

title: Work summary
content: Closed 7 tickets this week. Main wins: performance boost and cleaner UI.

title: Morning walk
content: Went for a 30-minute walk before breakfast. Fresh air actually helps to think clearly.

title: Book to read
content: ‘Project Hail Mary’ by Andy Weir — perfect mix of science and humor.

title: Workout plan
content: Push-ups, squats, and short runs. Keep it simple but consistent — at least 4 days a week.

title: Weekend plan
content: Maybe go to the park, take some photos, and grab coffee with Alex.

title: Things to improve
content: Sleep schedule. Less scrolling before bed, more reading instead.

title: Playlist update
content: Add some lo-fi beats for study sessions. Chill and focus vibes only.

title: Budget check
content: Review monthly expenses. Streaming services are getting out of hand.

title: Photo ideas
content: Try shooting reflections on rainy days — looks cinematic.

title: Mindfulness note
content: Take 5 minutes of silence after lunch. Helps reset focus.

title: Evening thoughts
content: Feeling tired but satisfied. Progress is progress, no matter how small.

title: Small win
content: Cooked dinner without burning anything. That’s a new record.

title: Gratitude list
content: Good coffee, helpful teammates, and sunny weather — that’s enough for today.

title: Project sync-up
content: Discussed API changes with backend team. Agreed to refactor endpoints next sprint.

title: Design review
content: Checked new mockups for mobile layout. Need better spacing in header area.

title: Weekly standup
content: Everyone’s on track except for analytics integration — waiting on credentials.

title: Client call notes
content: They liked the new dashboard style but asked for more customization options.

title: Brainstorm session
content: Lots of good ideas — dark mode toggle, smart tags, autosave improvements.

title: Sprint planning
content: Decided on 5 main tickets. Prioritize bug fixes first, then UX tweaks.

title: Team retro
content: Wins: better code review flow. Needs improvement: clearer issue descriptions.

title: Tech talk summary
content: Presentation on Next.js server components — useful insights on rendering strategy.

title: HR meeting
content: Discussed training budget and possible online courses for Q1.

title: Onboarding session
content: Introduced new teammate to repo structure and local dev setup.

title: UX sync
content: Alignment issue found in mobile header. Designer will fix by tomorrow.

title: Retrospective
content: Overall positive sprint. Need fewer last-minute merges.

title: Grocery list
content: Milk, bread, pasta, olive oil, apples, yogurt, and a bag of coffee beans.

title: Hardware check
content: Maybe get a new mouse — current one double-clicks on its own.

title: Online order
content: Track parcel from Amazon — expected delivery Thursday.

title: Gift ideas
content: Wireless earbuds or a small desk lamp — both practical and cool.

title: Kitchen restock
content: Out of rice and spices. Need to restock cumin and paprika.

title: Clothes to buy
content: Winter jacket, gloves, and one good pair of jeans.

title: Tech wishlist
content: External SSD, mechanical keyboard, and a good webcam.

title: Groceries reminder
content: Don’t forget coffee filters again — third time this month!

title: Online sale
content: Check discount codes before checkout — save that extra 10%.

title: Appliances
content: Need new kettle — current one sounds like a rocket taking off.

title: Weekend supplies
content: Snacks, soda, and maybe a new board game for Saturday night.

title: Subscription renewal
content: Netflix renews tomorrow. Consider pausing — barely watching lately.

title: App concept
content: A note app that turns short text ideas into structured outlines using AI.

title: Automation idea
content: Script that automatically renames downloaded files based on content type.

title: Website concept
content: Minimalist blog focused on developer productivity and tools.

title: Learning platform
content: Micro-courses that teach one concept at a time, no fluff.

title: Productivity tool
content: Browser extension that blocks distractions based on time of day.

title: Smart reminders
content: Reminders that adjust timing based on your daily routine.

title: Travel assistant
content: AI that builds itineraries based on your interests and energy levels.

title: Habit tracker
content: Visual habit chains with streaks and positive reinforcement quotes.

title: Code snippets manager
content: App for saving reusable code blocks with tags and syntax highlighting.

title: Gamified tasks
content: Turn daily goals into a small RPG — earn points, unlock themes.

title: Study app
content: Reminds you of previously learned topics right before you forget them.

title: Voice notes
content: Voice-to-text app that understands context and tags automatically.
